## Description {#details}

A record for a potential prefetch made during the initial scan of the loop.

This is used to let a single prefetch target multiple memory accesses.

Definition at line 233 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdataprefetch-cpp">LoopDataPrefetch.cpp</a>.

### addInstruction() {#a63798d891eed0f2ca719b80993bfd24d}

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="I">to this prefetch. If it&#39;s not the first one, &#39;InsertPt&#39; and &#39;Writes&#39; will be updated as required.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="PtrDiff">the known constant address difference to the first added instruction.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
